summary.span: Contains a set of objects.

span.span: Contains a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `profile`配置文件的部分指定用户配置文件的架构。The `profile` section of the configuration file specifies a schema for user profiles. 在运行时，ASP.NET 编译系统使用中指定的信息`profile`部分，以生成一个名为类`ProfileCommon`，它派生自。At run time, the ASP.NET compilation system uses the information specified in the `profile` section to generate a class called `ProfileCommon`, which is derived from . `ProfileCommon`类定义基于中定义的属性`properties`子节`profile`配置文件的部分。The `ProfileCommon` class definition is based on the properties defined in the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file. 此类的实例创建每个用户配置文件，并可以通过在代码中访问的各个配置文件值属性。An instance of this class is created for each user profile, and you can access the individual profile values in your code through the property. 有关配置文件属性的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 有关配置文件功能的详细信息添加到[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the profile features added to [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，它是实例的类。The following code example shows how to use the property, which is an instance of the class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将插入`clear`指令插入要清除在更高级的配置文件中定义的元素的所有引用的配置文件的相应部分。This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file. 删除当前的配置文件的相应部分中定义的所有元素。All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
